medical_history.chief_complaint: Ocular findings suggestive of glaucoma in young Chinese males.
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The patients were evaluated over a 7-year period, during which their symptoms were stable and non-progressive, showing no significant changes in visual fields or optic nerve appearance.
medical_history.past_medical_history: High myopia was present in 43.8% of eyes. Some patients had undergone intraocular pressure-lowering therapy and were being considered for glaucoma filtration surgery.
medical_history.family_history: Family history of presumed glaucoma was present in 25.0% of patients.
